pic1_alt: A map of the United States with each state depicted as an equal-size hexagon, with the 2-letter state abbreviation inside each hexagon. The hexagons are colored from light pink (IN and AR) to bright magenta (all other states), indicating how much precinct-level data is available for 2022 US House elections. The image is attributed to the MIT Election Data and Science Lab at github.com/MEDSL/2022-elections-official
pic2_alt: The MIT Election Data + Science Lab logo, with a stylized American flag composed of blue plus signs and large red dots.
